firm_information.name: CENTURY 21 Myers Real Estate Co., Inc. Northwest

house_listing.house_location: 11317 Dew Creek Circle Corpus Christi, TEXAS 78410
house_listing.house_description: Austin Brick home located on a quiet family cul-de-sac. Great yard with mature oak trees.Great floor plan with two dining areas and a utility room. Lots of windows for a light and airyatmosphere. Nice size kitchen with lotsa counter space and a pantry. Pretty fireplace is a wonderful focal point in the living area. You can rent while your loan is being approved.

highlights.item: Lg yard w/beautiful trees and landscaping.
Great floor plan w/ pretty Austin stone fireplace.
